posts.title: What I Learned When the Solution Stopped Being the Point
posts.excerpt: We'd spent months building toward an AI-powered financial literacy tool. But in that debrief, we realized we'd been trying to get migrant workers to confirm our interpretation rather than recognizing they already had frameworks just as valid as ours.

posts.title: Not Yet Dead: What REACH Taught Me About the Violence of Optimization
posts.excerpt: Last month I presented three years of work at the REACH Alliance conference. But what I actually remember isn't the presentation. It's afterward, when a group of us went out for ice cream.

academicPapers.title: The Ethics of Anthropomorphic AI for Emotional Support
academicPapers.description: Exploring ethical implications of anthropomorphic AI for emotional support, focusing on trust, dependency, and ethical design principles.

academicPapers.title: The Experience of Being 'Othered' in Singapore's CMIO Classification
academicPapers.description: A personal sociological examination of racial categorization and its implications in Singapore.

academicPapers.title: Redefining Society in the Age of AI
academicPapers.description: A sociological exploration of artificial intelligence's transformative impact.
